Package Controllers

Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.CustomerController
  • public class CustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls and populates the customers view, the edit customers view, and the add customers view

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void addCountry​(java.lang.String newCountry)  
      void addCustomer()
      creates add customer scene
      private static void addCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)  
      void close()
      closes scene
      void createCustomer()
      Grabs all values form the customer form if values are valid, creates a new customer record in the database then refreshes customer data and refreshes allCustomers array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid
      void deleteCustomer()
      Grabs selected customer from the customer table, queries database to delete the customer selected, refreshes customer data Throws alert if something goes wrong
      static Customer findCustomer​(int id)
      Iterates through Customer instances to find the matching Customer to given id
      Division findDivision​(java.lang.String name)
      Iterates through Division instances to find the matching Division to given name
      private void getAndSetDivisions​(java.lang.String country)
      Queries database to get all divisions by country, creates a Division instance for each record returned adds division to allDivisions observable array
      private void getCountries()
      Queries database to get all countries, adds the country string to the allCountries observable array
      static void getCustomers()
      Queries the database to get all Customer records and create Customer instances Stores all instances in allCustomers observable array
      void initialize()
      Connects to database, sets items in table for the customers view, sets items in dropdowns for edit and add views
      void modifyCustomer()
      creates modify customer scene, sets selectedCustomer to customer selected on table
      private void setFormValues()
      Sets initial form values for the edit customer view, sets dropdown values, sets onClick methods for the save button
      private void setLocalDefault()
      Sets all text in view to users local default language
      static void setSelectedCustomer​(Customer customer)  
      void updateCustomer()
      Grabs all values form the customer form if values are valid, updates the customer record in the database that matches the ID taken from form then refreshes customer data and refreshes allCustomers array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid
      void updatedFilteredDivisions​(Division division, java.lang.String country)
      Checks Division instance to see if the associated Country matches given country This updates the Division dropdown according to selected Country

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Connects to database, sets items in table for the customers view, sets items in dropdowns for edit and add views

      • setFormValues

        private void setFormValues()
        Sets initial form values for the edit customer view, sets dropdown values, sets onClick methods for the save button

      • setLocalDefault

        private void setLocalDefault()
        Sets all text in view to users local default language

      • getCustomers

        public static void getCustomers()
        Queries the database to get all Customer records and create Customer instances Stores all instances in allCustomers observable array

      • getCountries

        private void getCountries()
        Queries database to get all countries, adds the country string to the allCountries observable array

      • getAndSetDivisions

        private void getAndSetDivisions​(java.lang.String country)
        Queries database to get all divisions by country, creates a Division instance for each record returned adds division to allDivisions observable array
        Parameters:
        country - a string of a country name that will match association in database between Divisions and Countries

      • findDivision

        public Division findDivision​(java.lang.String name)
        Iterates through Division instances to find the matching Division to given name
        Parameters:
        name - a name that should match a Division instance
        Returns:
        Division the division that matches the given name

      • findCustomer

        public static Customer findCustomer​(int id)
        Iterates through Customer instances to find the matching Customer to given id
        Parameters:
        id - an id that should match a Customer instance
        Returns:
        Customer the customer that matches the given id

      • updatedFilteredDivisions

        public void updatedFilteredDivisions​(Division division,
                                     java.lang.String country)
        Checks Division instance to see if the associated Country matches given country This updates the Division dropdown according to selected Country
        Parameters:
        division - a Division that will be added to the allDivisions array if the country matches the given country
        country - a String representing the selected Country on the dropdown

      • createCustomer

        public void createCustomer()
        Grabs all values form the customer form if values are valid, creates a new customer record in the database then refreshes customer data and refreshes allCustomers array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid

      • updateCustomer

        public void updateCustomer()
        Grabs all values form the customer form if values are valid, updates the customer record in the database that matches the ID taken from form then refreshes customer data and refreshes allCustomers array Throws alert if something goes wrong, or if the record is invalid

      • deleteCustomer

        public void deleteCustomer()
        Grabs selected customer from the customer table, queries database to delete the customer selected, refreshes customer data Throws alert if something goes wrong

      • setSelectedCustomer

        public static void setSelectedCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Parameters:
        customer - the selected customer in customer table

      • addCustomer

        private static void addCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)
        Parameters:
        newCustomer - a customer to be added to the allCustomers array

      • addCountry

        private static void addCountry​(java.lang.String newCountry)
        Parameters:
        newCountry - a country to be added to the allCountries array

      • addCustomer

        public void addCustomer()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        creates add customer scene
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong

      • modifyCustomer

        public void modifyCustomer()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        creates modify customer scene, sets selectedCustomer to customer selected on table
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong

      • close

        public void close()
        closes scene
